verbs.description: JEFFERSON CITY , Mo. ( AP ) - Missouri Attorney General Josh Hawley [V: is] supporting a Trump administration plan to ask people if they are citizens during the 2020 Census . Hawley said Monday that asking a citizenship question " is common sense .
